please_enable_gps: Please enable GPS in Settings to get weather for your location.
permission_permanently_denied: Location permission is permanently denied. Please enable it in Settings.
gps_timeout_using_last: GPS timeout. Using last known location.
gps_timeout_using_default: GPS timeout. Loading default city weather.
aqi_advice_good: Air quality is excellent, safe for all outdoor activities!
aqi_advice_fair: Air quality is good, can engage in outdoor activities normally.
aqi_advice_moderate: Sensitive people should limit prolonged outdoor activities.
aqi_advice_poor: Wear a mask when going outside, limit intense physical activities.
aqi_advice_very_poor: Limit going outside, close windows and use air purifier.
uv_advice_low: No protection needed. Safe to be outside.
uv_advice_moderate: Wear sunscreen and a hat if outside for 30+ minutes.
uv_advice_high: Protection required. Wear sunscreen, hat, and sunglasses.
uv_advice_very_high: Extra protection needed. Avoid sun during midday.
uv_advice_extreme: Take all precautions. Avoid sun exposure if possible.
gieo_que_instructions: Luck Forecast for the Fire Horse Year
